1. With each passing day, it seems like the Apple faithful are becoming more and more rabid. I’m just waiting for the first reported case of someone infected with the Apple virus. Or maybe it’s already out there and we just don’t know it yet. There’s a whole other layer to this story that no one has even considered.

It’s like a real-life Invasion of the Body Snatchers, only instead of people being taken over by aliens, they’re being taken over by Apple products. I can’t help but think that this is all part of some grand plan by Apple to take over the world. After all, they already have a cult-like following, and now they’ve added a virus to their arsenal. It’s only a matter of time before they start building their own army of tech fanatics.

And when Apple starts building their own army, things will get really interesting. I imagine it’ll be a lot like the first Matrix movie, except instead of people being plugged into a simulated reality, they’ll be plugged into an Apple reality. Apple will be able to control every aspect of their lives, down to the smallest detail.

But the funny thing is, people will be happier than ever. They’ll finally have everything they’ve ever wanted, and they won’t even know it. They’ll be so caught up in the illusion of freedom and choice that they won’t even realize they’re being controlled. It’s a modern-day version of The Truman Show, only instead of a TV show, it’s an entire company that’s keeping everything under control.

I guess it’s true what they say – behind every great company is a great conspiracy. Apple is just the latest in a long line of corporations that have taken over the
